name: HSC Pediatric Center
description:
As a nonprofit health care organization committed to serving families with complex health care needs and eliminating barriers to health services, the System’s mission and services are designed to offer a comprehensive approach to caring, serving and empowering people with disabilities.

The mission of The HSC Health Care System is to provide and coordinate innovative, high quality, community-based care for individuals with complex needs and their families. HSC empowers all we serve to improve the quality of their lives.
